Law and Disorder in Lagos bụ ihe nkiri Britain nke Louis Theroux mere n'afọ 2010.
Theroux na-aga Lagos, obodo kachasị ukwuu na Naịjirịa, iji nyochaa ọdịdị iwu na usoro na obodo ahụ na-agbasa ngwa ngwa

N'ebe ahụ, ọ na-eso ndị agha gọọmentị na-achịkwa KAI (Kick Against Indiscipline), onye isi otu a ma ama MC Oluomo, na ndị otu ndị na-eto eto a maara dị ka "Area Boys" bụ ndị na-elekọta mpaghara maka ego.

Na 30 Septemba afọ 2015, Kunle "Mammok" Mamowora, onye nduzi Theroux gburugburu Lagos na Chief Security Officer na MC Oluomo, bụ onye ndị mwakpo a kwenyere na ha bụ ndị otu ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị na-asọmpi gbara egbe ma gbuo ya.
